title: Dictionary Support - Add to Dictionary Feature
description: Enable users to add misspelled words to a custom dictionary via right-click context menu. Uses Electron's native spellcheck APIs with native OS context menu.

title: Implement spellcheck context menu in main process
description: Add context-menu event handler in main.ts that detects misspelled words and shows native context menu with spelling suggestions and 'Add to Dictionary' option. Uses webContents.on('context-menu', params) to get misspelledWord and dictionarySuggestions.

title: Add word replacement functionality
description: When user clicks a spelling suggestion in the context menu, replace the misspelled word using webContents.replaceMisspelling(suggestion).

title: Implement Add to Dictionary functionality
description: Add 'Add to Dictionary' menu item that calls session.addWordToSpellCheckerDictionary(word). This persists to OS dictionary on macOS/Windows automatically.

title: Add standard edit operations to context menu
description: Include Cut, Copy, Paste, Select All options in the context menu for editable fields. Use Electron Menu roles for native behavior.

title: Add IPC handlers for dictionary management
description: Create IPC handlers: dictionary:list (list custom words), dictionary:add (add word), dictionary:remove (remove word). Expose via preload for potential future UI needs.

title: Add type definitions for dictionary API
description: Add TypeScript type definitions to scribe.d.ts for the dictionary API: DictionaryAPI interface with list(), add(word), remove(word) methods.

title: Test dictionary functionality manually
description: Manual testing: 1) Type misspelled word, verify red underline, 2) Right-click shows suggestions, 3) Click suggestion replaces word, 4) Add to Dictionary removes underline, 5) Word persists after app restart.
